newsitem.title: POLAND: Sab partnership to invest $200 mln in Polan.
newsitem.headline: Sab partnership to invest $200 mln in Polan.

text.p: Poland's largest brewery group, in which South African Breweries Ltd (SAB) has a strategic stake, plans to double its investment in Poland to about $400 million in five years, Meyer Kahen, SAB group chairman, said on Tuesday.
